summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Union Street, from Eighth Avenue to the east line of Hubbell Place, and Ninth Avenue, from Union Street to Pine Street, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with granite curbs, and such extensions to the existing water main and sewer system as may be necessary, in accordance with Resolution No. 719 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
